response.summary: Marco Guevara is a professional in processes and environmental modeling oriented to evaluate energy transition strategies to face air quality issues and climate change. As expert in computational simulation and modeling of physical/chemical processes and transport phenomena, in the fields of chemical and environmental sciences and engineering, he develops research and applied projects involving the development, and implementation, of computational techniques for the representation, understanding, and forecasting of data mainly linked to meteorology, air quality, energy transition, and climate change.
response.skills: Inglés, Gestión de proyectos, Investigación y desarrollo, Matlab, Ingeniería, Ingeniería química, Simulación de procesos, Ingeniería de procesos, Español, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, ANSYS, fluent, OpenFOAM, computational fluid dynamics, CFD, Aspen HYSYS, Aspen Plus, Teamwork, Team Leadership
